categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: The Plasma Devils were a Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps squadron operating in the Outer Rim in the time following the Battle of Yavin. Buried deep within the underworld, they proved a significant threat to the expansion of the Galactic Empire.

After the destruction of the Death Star, the Empire launched a major crackdown against significant criminal operations in the Outer Rim. After the destruction of the Son-tuul Pride, Grand General Cassio Tagge turned the Imperial Military's attention to destroying the Plasma Devils, who were actively opposing Imperial expansion. He instructed Morit Astarte and Aiolin Astarte to hunt them down and destroy them.
With the death of The Ante, the Plasma Devils attempted to escape from the Empire. However, Darth Vader led his own forces toward them, eradicating them nearly singlehandedly.
